---
title: "Scraping data"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r library}
library(RSelenium)
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, cache=TRUE}
base_url <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/players/j/jamesle01/gamelog/"
urls <- str_c(base_url, c(2004:2020))

Jstats <- map(urls, function(url){
  Sys.sleep(rexp(1)+4)
  url%>%
    read_html()%>%
    html_table(fill = T)%>%
    .[[8]]
})

James <- do.call(rbind, Jstats)
```
